\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.archivetable.prefix}
\label{configuration:DatabaseArchivetablePrefix}
\ClearAPI
The prefix the name of a table used to archive objects has to start with. Valid values are all strings of chars which can be used in database table names, default value is empty.
